definitions.definition: make or become liquefied by heat.
examples: place under the broiler until the cheese has melted
synonyms: deliquesce "the snow was beginning to melt"

definitions.definition: melt something, especially a metal article, so that the material it is made of can be used again.
examples: beautiful objects are being melted down and sold for scrap
add a cup of sugar and boil until the sugar melts

definitions.definition: make or become more tender or loving.
examples: she was so beautiful that I melted
the compromise was accepted and the opposition melted away

definitions.definition: change or merge imperceptibly into (another form or state).
examples: the cheers melted into gasps of admiration
